title: SCF Field
description: Schema for Secure Custom Fields field definitions. Auto-generated from field-fragments/.

oneOf.description: Single field object with required parent
Array of field objects with required parent

key.description: Unique identifier for the field with field_ prefix (e.g. 'field_abc123')

label.description: The label displayed for this field

name.description: The field name/meta_key used to save and load data (empty for layout fields like tab, accordion)

conditional_logic.description: Conditional logic rules for field visibility. False/0/empty string to disable, or array of rule groups.

width.description: Width of the field wrapper (e.g. '50' for 50%)

class.description: CSS class(es) for the field wrapper

id.description: HTML ID for the field wrapper

menu_order.description: Order of the field within its parent

parent.description: Parent field or field group key/ID

parent_layout.description: Parent layout key for flexible content sub-fields

enable_opacity.description: Enable alpha/opacity selector for RGBA colors

custom_palette_source.description: Source for custom color palette (empty for default)

palette_colors.description: Custom palette colors as comma-separated hex values

show_color_wheel.description: Display the color wheel picker interface

return_format.description: Value returned (hex string or RGBA array)

conditional_logic.description: Conditional logic rules for field visibility. False/0/empty string to disable, or array of rule groups.

width.description: Width of the field wrapper (e.g. '50' for 50%)

class.description: CSS class(es) for the field wrapper

id.description: HTML ID for the field wrapper

menu_order.description: Order of the field within its parent

parent.description: Parent field or field group key/ID

parent_layout.description: Parent layout key for flexible content sub-fields

filters.description: Enabled filters for the relationship field UI

return_format.description: Value returned (WP_Post object or post ID)

key.description: Unique identifier for the field with field_ prefix (e.g. 'field_abc123')

label.description: The label displayed for this field

name.description: The field name/meta_key used to save and load data (empty for layout fields like tab, accordion)

conditional_logic.description: Conditional logic rules for field visibility. False/0/empty string to disable, or array of rule groups.

width.description: Width of the field wrapper (e.g. '50' for 50%)

class.description: CSS class(es) for the field wrapper

id.description: HTML ID for the field wrapper

menu_order.description: Order of the field within its parent

parent.description: Parent field or field group key/ID

parent_layout.description: Parent layout key for flexible content sub-fields

taxonomy.description: The taxonomy to select terms from

return_format.description: Value returned (WP_Term object or term ID)

add_term.description: Allow new terms to be created (1 for yes, 0 for no)

load_terms.description: Load terms assigned to post (1 for yes, 0 for no)

save_terms.description: Connect selected terms to post (1 for yes, 0 for no)

key.description: Unique identifier for the field with field_ prefix (e.g. 'field_abc123')

label.description: The label displayed for this field

name.description: The field name/meta_key used to save and load data (empty for layout fields like tab, accordion)

conditional_logic.description: Conditional logic rules for field visibility. False/0/empty string to disable, or array of rule groups.

width.description: Width of the field wrapper (e.g. '50' for 50%)

class.description: CSS class(es) for the field wrapper

id.description: HTML ID for the field wrapper

menu_order.description: Order of the field within its parent

parent.description: Parent field or field group key/ID

parent_layout.description: Parent layout key for flexible content sub-fields

role.description: Limit to specific user role (empty for all roles)

return_format.description: Value returned (user array, WP_User object, or user ID)

conditionalLogicGroup.description: Group of conditional logic rules (AND logic within group)

value.description: Value to compare against (not required for ==empty and !=empty operators)

default_value_numeric.description: Default value for numeric fields (string for empty, number for value)

default_value_multi.description: Default value(s) for multi-select fields (string for single, array for multiple)

placeholder.description: Placeholder text shown when field is empty

prepend.description: Text or HTML displayed before the input

append.description: Text or HTML displayed after the input

maxlength.description: Maximum character length (empty string for unlimited)

rows.description: Number of rows for textarea display

new_lines.description: How to handle new lines in output (wpautop, br, or none)

return_format_media.description: How the media value is returned (array of data, URL string, or attachment ID)

library.description: Media library source (all media or uploaded to current post only)

mime_types.description: Comma-separated list of allowed MIME types (e.g., 'image/png, image/jpeg')

preview_size.description: Image size for preview display in admin

min_width.description: Minimum image width in pixels (0 for no limit)

min_height.description: Minimum image height in pixels (0 for no limit)

max_width.description: Maximum image width in pixels (0 for no limit)

max_height.description: Maximum image height in pixels (0 for no limit)

min_size.description: Minimum file size in MB (0 for no limit)

max_size.description: Maximum file size in MB (0 for no limit)

choices.description: Available choices as value:label pairs (object when populated, array when empty)

allow_null.description: Allow a null/empty value to be selected (1 for yes, 0 for no)

multiple.description: Allow multiple values to be selected (1 for yes, 0 for no)

return_format_choice.description: Value returned (value, label, or both as array)

layout_choice.description: Layout direction for choices (default varies by field type)

min.description: Minimum number of items required (0 for no minimum)

max.description: Maximum number of items allowed (0 for no limit)

post_type.description: Limit selection to specific post types (empty for all)

taxonomy_filter.description: Limit selection to posts with specific taxonomy terms

first_day.description: Week start day (0 = Sunday, 1 = Monday, etc.)

default_to_current_date.description: Set current date/time as default value (1 for yes, 0 for no)

layout_display.description: Visual layout style for rendering fields

button_label.description: Text label for the add row button

endpoint.description: Define an endpoint for the previous accordion/tab group
